context: after charging with the charger i have how will i pair this with my console. just push the ps button or what?
response: when you connect the controller you press the ps button in the center when it is connected via the usb

context: On what programs (Vista, 7, XP) does it work on?
response: I played it on both XP and 7.... I assume it also works on vista.

context: Can you remove the orange keys and replace them with black ones (does the keyboard come with any)?
response: No, the keyboard does not come with any other keys besides what is shown in its picture. This is just a really good and plain Keyboard with a cord.It types very well.

context: Will this work with the Iphone 4
response: Yes....iphone 4s, 5s , ipad, samsung can all be charged from this device.
I couldn't get it to run through Steam, then I installed Games For Windows(http://www.xbox.com/en-US/LIVE/PC/DownloadClient), logged in and relaunched through Steam, now it launches.

context: Can a single LIVE account be used for Xbox 360 and Xbox ONE?  Can this headset be used for Xbox One?
response: Yes, a single account serves on both consoles. This headset will not work on the Xbox One nor will the keyboard.

context: How bad is the tendency for this yoke to "stick" and "bind" when using both ailerons and elevator at the same time?
response: My yoke doesn't bind. Sensitivity is adjustable within the software. Mechanically speaking, mine works fine.

context: Since my Xbox One (with Kinect) is synced with my TV, can I also listen to TV shows & movies with these wirelessly?  THANKS!
response: Yup. I do. The only trick with these headphones is you have to buy the cable and special adapter for the X-Box One for chat to work with the X-Box One.

context: Anyone else have problem with buttons no longer working? The entire left side of my yoke including hatswitch suddenly stopped working.
response: No problems so far.  All features are working perfectly so I'm afraid I can't be much help.

context: What color are the backlit keys on this keyboard?
response: What color do you want then to be?  There are like 24 colors to choose from and you can change the intensity and stuff like that. My rig is red and blue so I have it cycle back and fourth to match. There is the standard razer green which is very cool

response: It should have no problem fitting a wired controller

context: Is this Legendary Edition an actual standalone version of Skyrim, or is it an add-on where I would need to buy the original game as well?
response: it is the whole shootin match the game and all the add ons.

context: how long is the usb chord?
response: Hey Joseph... chords are at least 1.5 meters (59 inches) long. Totally recommend it!. Hope my answer helps.

context: can you play multiplayer split screen offline
is it possible to hold a 3DS XL that's being enclosed in the duraflexi protector?
